data.text: “You people in Jerusalem who are from the tribe of Benjamin,
Jerusalem is like a beautiful pasture full of sheep,
Enemy kings, not shepherds [MET], will come with their armies and set up their tents around the city,
The kings will tell their troops,
we will attack them at night
Yahweh, the Commander of the armies of angels in heaven, says this:
It is as though the wicked things that the people do
Listen to what I am warning you, you people of [APO] Jerusalem,
Yahweh, the Commander of the armies of angels in heaven, also says this:
Then I said, “If I speak to the Israeli people to warn them,
So now I am extremely angry, like Yahweh is angry,
Tell the men that I will give their houses to their enemies,
Everyone is trying to get money by tricking others,
They act as though the sins of my people are like [MET] small wounds that they do not need to put bandages on.
They should be [RHQ] ashamed about the disgusting things that they do,
This is also what Yahweh said to the Israeli people:
I sent my prophets who were like [MET] watchmen.
Therefore, you people in the other nations, listen to this:
Listen, all of you!
You Israeli people, when you burn frankincense that came from far away in Sheba,
Therefore, I will put obstacles on the roads on which my people will travel.
Yahweh also says this:
They have bows and arrows and spears;
The people of Jerusalem say,
So one person says to another,
So I say, “My dear people, put on ◄sackcloth/rough clothes► and sit in ashes to show that you are sorry for your sins.
Then Yahweh said to me,
You will find out that they are very stubborn rebels,
A metalworker causes the bellows to blow very hard to make the fire very hot to completely burn up the impurities [MET].
I, Yahweh, have rejected them;
